-1.title: Michel Roux Jr. meets John Evans, Maltman at The Balvenie Whisky

episode of.title: The Craftsmen's Dinner with Michel Roux Jr. (TV Series 2016– )

-1.plot: Michel learns about the barley at The Balvenie distillery - a crucial ingredient in whisky-making which is tended to in a traditional way. How will he use the barley in a recipe?

1.title: Michel Roux Meets Ferraby Knives

episode of.title: The Craftsmen's Dinner with Michel Roux Jr. (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Michel Roux Jr meets Will Ferraby, one of the last knife-makers in Britain, to see how he transfers Sheffield steel into one of the finest culinary knives you can buy.

2.title: Michel Roux Jr Meets Grierson Organic

episode of.title: The Craftsmen's Dinner with Michel Roux Jr. (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Michel Roux Jr meets Sasha and Hugh Grierson at their Scottish farm to see how farming the old fashioned way has helped them to create one the most celebrated livestock farms around.

3.title: Michel Roux Jr Meets North Street Potters

episode of.title: The Craftsmen's Dinner with Michel Roux Jr. (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Michel Roux Jr meets Naine Woodrow at her Clapham pottery to discuss the craft that goes into making her famous dinner services and tableware. He even puts in an order for The Craftsmen's Dinner.

4.title: Michel Roux Jr Meets Ridgeview Winery

episode of.title: The Craftsmen's Dinner with Michel Roux Jr. (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: In the fourth episode of our latest series The Craftsmen's Dinner, Michel Roux Jr. visits Ridgeview, an award-winning sparkling wine producer in the South Downs of England, to find out how Simon Roberts and his family are reviving a once dormant national craft.

5.title: Michel Roux Jr Meets Hansen & Lydersen

episode of.title: The Craftsmen's Dinner with Michel Roux Jr. (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Michel Roux Jr meets Ole Hansen at his smokehouse in the Cotswolds to understand the passion, the craft and the jazz music that goes into producing one of the UK's finest smoked salmons.

6.title: A Special Whisky and a Special Dinner

episode of.title: The Craftsmen's Dinner with Michel Roux Jr. (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: In the final episode of the series, Michel Roux Jr discovers the craft behind The Balvenie and brings together all the craftspeople he's met on his journey to celebrate their efforts and their craft.

imdb.title: The Craftsmen's Dinner with Michel Roux Jr.
akas: The Craftsmen's Dinner with Michel Roux Jr. (United Kingdom)
plot: The Craftsmen's Dinner is a six-part YouTube series in which the two Michelin starred chef, Michel Roux Jr, and the Balvenie join forces to unearth the true meaning of craftsmanship.::Rogan Productions
